about_the_game:
Pooh is no longer the cute little bear he used to be... something has corrupted him, and now he thirsts for blood. Gather your courage and investigate.

Play as Friend, Pooh's favorite human in the world. Not just anyone can taste Pooh's honey. Read the invitation he sent and then head to his house in the forest. When you enter his house, you'll discover that Pooh has changed a bit. But that's okay! Have a chat with Pooh; he has something to show you. Notice that Pooh's new honey is a bit too red for your liking. Try to escape by exploring Pooh's house while he's distracted. He'll attack you if he catches you trying to escape or snooping around his things. Bears are very territorial, you know?

It's Honey Time!


  • Collect all the notes
Find the notes scattered throughout Pooh's house... they may reveal a terrifying secret.

  • Investigate Pooh's house
Bloodstains abound in the furnishings. Explore the place, interact with Pooh's strange objects, but be careful; he may not like the idea.

  • Try Pooh's "honey"
The honey has changed since the last time you visited this place...

In Honey Time with Pooh, your duty will be to investigate why Pooh has become the monster he is now, as no one is clear about the origin of his madness. Throughout the game, you'll have the opportunity to acquire items and more objects that will allow you to confront him.

content_descriptors.notes: A huge bloodthirsty yellow bear will be seen.

name: Honey Time! with Pooh!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Honey Time with Pooh is a game about survival and escape. Pooh has invited you for honey. He recently went through the trouble of gathering it all for you. Please come by and show your appreciation.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
